lead_paragraph: ROBINSON--Judith. (nee Gropper) Woman of compassion, valor and love. Wife of Ira for 58 years. Mother of Roni (Jed), Douglas (Leslie). Grandmother of Chelsea, Logan, Jake and Lily. Docent for over 30 years at the Jewish Museum. Loved Penn State, Sigma Delta Tau, art and life. Traveled extensively, National Honor Society, reached 80. Rest in peace, you've earned it many times over. Donations to The Jewish Museum or Temple Israel of South Merrick. 1/3
